item.title: ARM64 Expected To Support Lazy Preemption "PREEMPT_LAZY" With Linux 6.16

item.title: Wormable AirPlay Flaws Enable Zero-Click RCE on Apple Devices via Public Wi-Fi
item.description:
Cybersecurity researchers have disclosed a series of now-patched security vulnerabilities in Apple's AirPlay protocol that, if successfully exploited, could enable an attacker to take over susceptible devices supporting the proprietary wireless technology.
The shortcomings have been collectively codenamed AirBorne by Israeli cybersecurity company Oligo.

item.title: The SEC Rallies BlackRock, Nasdaq and Fidelity for Pivotal Tokenization Summit
item.description:
The SEC has announced a May 12 roundtable to probe tokenization, bringing BlackRock, Nasdaq, Invesco, Franklin Templeton and others together with regulators. Two panels will weigh operational and legal hurdles of shifting traditional assets onto blockchains, informing future policy moves.

item.title: Is Bybit’s 500x Leverage on US Stocks and Gold a Game-Changer – or Disaster?
item.description:
Bybit has disclosed plans to launch trading in U.S. equities such as Apple, plus gold and crude oil, by Q2 2025 through its MT5 gateway. The exchange has paired the move with up to 500x leverage and AI-driven analytics after a record $1.5 billion hack prompted a sweeping security rebuild globally.

The post Is Bybit’s 500x Leverage on US Stocks and Gold a Game-Changer – or Disaster? appeared first on Cryptonews.

item.title: Strategy BTC Vault Swells to 555K After $180M Swoop – Will Rivals Follow?
item.description:
Strategy BTC has continued its aggressive treasury shift, adding 1,895 BTC at $95,167 each for $180.3 M. The firm now controls 555,450 BTC bought for $38.08 B, setting its average cost at $68,550 and leaving year-to-date gains near 14 % even as MSTR shares have slipped 3.9 % after the disclosure.

The post Strategy BTC Vault Swells to 555K After $180M Swoop – Will Rivals Follow? appeared first on Cryptonews.

item.title: Indonesia Freezes World Project After Shell-Permit Breach – 20 M Traders on Edge
item.description:
Indonesia has suspended Sam Altman’s Worldcoin after investigators found its iris-scanning service lacked the mandatory operator certificate and ran under a shell entity. The move has intensified debate over trading biometric data for tokens and echoes probes unfolding in Germany, Kenya, and Brazil.

The post Indonesia Freezes World Project After Shell-Permit Breach – 20 M Traders on Edge appeared first on Cryptonews.
